definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: How long is the boat time table effective?
sentences.chinese: 行船时刻表有效期是多长时间？

sentences.english: It means that learning is like sailing upstream.
sentences.chinese: 意思就是说学习像在逆水中行船。

sentences.english: The boat time-table is effective from the first of August till the first of November.
sentences.chinese: 行船时刻表有效期从八月一日到十一月一日。

definition: person who lives and makes a living on a boat/boatman/boat dweller
to embark/to travel by ship/to ferry
(of a boat) to reach the shore/to pull toward shore/close to shore/landfall
to scull (with a single oar, usually mounted on the stern of the boat)
